title: [Pinefar, Winter Holly Room]
description: The walls of the bedroom are painted a deep shade of green, and against the far wall sits a massive oak bed.  At the bed's foot is a cedar chest, replete with carvings.  A window opposite the bed lets in light, which shines through the bright red curtains and gives the room a rosy glow.

The walls of the bedroom are painted a deep shade of green, and against the far wall sits a massive oak bed.  At the bed's foot is a cedar chest, replete with carvings.  A window opposite the bed lets in moonlight, which shines through the red curtains and gives the room a soft rosy glow.
